faq_q1: Where does the name Bee Bridges Interactive come from?
faq_r1: Our name carries a double meaning that guides our vision. “Bee” symbolizes teamwork and collective creation. It also echoes the Bambara word “bɛɛ,” meaning “everyone.” Combined with “Bridges,” it embodies our mission: “Everyone together on the bridges” — creating connections between cultures, genres, and media through authentic video game and transmedia experiences.
faq_q2: "Hey, isn’t this the same team as Blind Bend Studio?"
faq_r2: Yes, it is! Bee Bridges Interactive represents the evolution of our passion, with a renewed vision to share our creations with an even wider audience.
faq_q3: What makes your transmedia approach unique?
faq_r3: Unlike a simple adaptation, we design stories from the start to live across multiple media. The video game is the core experience, but key elements can be discovered in a comic, a podcast… creating a rich and coherent narrative ecosystem.
faq_q4: Is diversity at the heart of all your projects?
faq_r4: Yes, because it reflects the real world. It is not a 'theme' but a foundation. Our characters and universes are built to entertain first while representing human complexity.
faq_r5: We are currently developing “Blind Frontiers”, our next immersive narrative experience. Learn more at: www.blindfrontiers.com
faq_q6: Where can I follow your latest updates?
faq_r6: Instagram, TikTok, Discord, LinkedIn, and our newsletter are the best ways to follow our announcements, behind-the-scenes content, and transmedia updates.
faq_q7: Are you hiring? Do you offer internships?
faq_r7: All our opportunities (jobs, discovery internships) are announced on our social platforms. If no active listing is available, it means we currently cannot welcome new talent — but your interest truly means a lot to us.
faq_q8: Do you accept collaborations with other creators?
faq_r8: Absolutely! We are open to partnerships with artists, musicians, or studios whose vision aligns with ours. Contact us through our form or at contact@beebridgesinteractive.com.

actualites_page_subtitle: Discover our latest updates, projects and events
article1_title: Launch of Our New Revolutionary Project
article1_p1: We are delighted to announce the launch of our brand-new project that will transform the video game industry. After months of intensive development and rigorous testing, we are finally ready to unveil this major innovation.
article1_p2: This project represents the culmination of our vision: creating interactive experiences that push the limits of creativity and technology. Our team worked tirelessly to offer you something unique and memorable.
article1_section1_intro: Our approach stands out thanks to several innovative aspects:
article1_point1: Technological Innovation: Using the latest advances in graphics engines and artificial intelligence
article1_point2: Immersive Gameplay: An experience that draws players into a captivating universe from the very first minutes
article1_point3: Engaging Narrative: A deep story that adapts to players’ choices
article1_point4: Stunning Visuals: High-quality graphics that bring every detail to life
article1_quote: "This project represents everything we love about game development: creativity, innovation, and the passion to create unforgettable experiences." – Maxsen Team
article1_section2_p1: The next few weeks will be crucial for the development and refinement of this project. We plan to launch an open beta-testing phase to collect your feedback and continuously improve the experience.
article1_section2_p2: Your participation and feedback are essential in helping us build the best product possible. We are excited to share this adventure with you and to see how you interact with our creation.
article1_section3_p1: If you want to be part of this extraordinary adventure, sign up now for our beta-testing program. You will get early access and the opportunity to directly influence the final development.
article1_section3_p2: Stay connected on our social networks to avoid missing upcoming announcements and exclusive content. The adventure is just beginning!
article2_title: Participation in the Game Developers Conference 2025
article2_p1: Our team had the honor of participating in the Game Developers Conference 2025, one of the most prestigious events in the video game industry. This experience allowed us to meet talented creators from around the world and exchange insights on the latest trends in the sector.
article2_section1_p1: During this three-day event, we were able to present our vision of game development and share our expertise with the international community. These exchanges were particularly enriching and provided new perspectives for our future projects.
article2_point1: Networking: Meeting with more than 50 development studios
article2_point2: Conferences: Participation in inspiring talks on the future of gaming
article2_point3: Demonstrations: Presentation of our prototypes to an expert audience
article2_point4: Collaborations: Discussions for future strategic partnerships
article2_quote: "GDC 2025 was an incredible source of inspiration. We return with fresh ideas and renewed motivation for our projects." – Maxsen Team
article2_section2_p1: Several major trends emerged from this edition: the increasing importance of accessibility in games, the use of AI to create more dynamic experiences, and the rise of innovative multiplayer concepts.
article2_section2_p2: These insights will directly influence our development approach and help us create games that meet modern player expectations while pushing the limits of creativity.
article2_section3_p1: Following this experience, we will integrate these new insights into our ongoing projects. We also plan to participate in similar events to remain at the forefront of innovation in the industry.
article2_section3_p2: A big thank you to everyone who took the time to talk with us and share their passion for video games. These encounters are precious and fuel our creativity every day.
